name: Enforce Futility
desc:
Creatures you choose within range must succeed on an Intuition saving throw or be overcome by your sheer power and become frightened of you. While frightened in this way, a creature can't make any weapon attacks. If they cast a spell that would require a saving throw, all targeted creatures have advantage on the saving throw.

A creature that ends their turn more than 60 feet away from you can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.
author: CrusaderDroid
